text: Allah jippinii ko ɓuri moƴƴude e yewtere, Deftere nanndunde [ñaawooje], ɗimmitunde. Nde guri ɓen hulooɓe Joomi mun riɓirta (nanugol nde), refti guri e ɓerɗe maɓɓe deeƴira jantoore Allah nden. Ko ɗum woni peewal Allah ngal O fewnirta on Mo muuyani. Kala non mo Allah majjini, haray fewnoowo mo alaa
